thread.title: Drake Apparently Can’t Be Spotted With A Woman Without Setting Off Dating Rumors
thread.title_full: Drake Apparently Can’t Be Spotted With A Woman Without Setting Off Dating Rumors

author: Danielle Harling
title: Drake Apparently Can’t Be Spotted With A Woman Without Setting Off Dating Rumors
text:
Drake Apparently Can’t Be Spotted With A Woman Without Setting Off Dating Rumors February 21, 2017 | 3:48 PM 2 
The push to get Drake in his next relationship has become all too real. 
The rumor mill has been buzzing rather consistently as of late when it concerns Drake and a future boo. Over the past month, he’s been spotted with multiple models, including former WSHH Honey Rosee Divine and Swedish twins Elizabeth and Victoria Lejonhjärta . 
Drake cozying up with another model has set the rumor mill on fire yet again, although the “proof” about this one is potentially dubious. 
The latest attempt to link Drake with a woman other than former fling Jennifer Lopez comes shortly after the Canadian superstar was spotted with model Winnie Harlow while at a club in London. 
“Jourdan Dunn and Adriana Lima were also at the bash but Drake only had eyes for Winnie … Winnie and Drake have always had a close friendship, with him even rapping about her on track ‘Know Yourself,’ but they looked particularly intimate on Saturday,” a source present at the club revealed to The Sun . 
Both Toronto natives, Drake has known Harlow for a while and even gave his model pal a shoutout on the If You’re Reading This It’s Too Late track, “Know Yourself.” 
“Got P Reign and Chubby and TJ and Winnie and woah,” Drake raps on the song. A post shared by Brittany Renner (@bundleofbrittany) on Feb 2, 2015 at 11:49am PST 
Although Drizzy and Harlow were spotted looking “particularly intimate” at London’s Libertine nightclub, a quick glance at Harlow’s Instagram account also shows that getting “particularly intimate” is kind of her thing. A post shared by ♔Don Pablo♔ (@winnieharlow) on Feb 15, 2017 at 11:54am PST A post shared by ♔Don Pablo♔ (@winnieharlow) on Feb 19, 2017 at 6:28am PST A post shared by ♔Don Pablo♔ (@winnieharlow) on Feb 19, 2017 at 12:44pm PST A post shared by ♔Don Pablo♔ (@winnieharlow) on Feb 21, 2017 at 4:52am PST 
Additionally, Harlow was allegedly linked romantically to producer and friend to Drake, Noah “40” Shebib . 
Although the possible relationship between 40 and Harlow didn’t get nearly as much publicity as Drake and his faux baes, the two have shared the occasional social media post about the other. 
In 2014, Harlow became 40’s first ever #WCW. A post shared by Noah Shebib (@ovo40) on Apr 23, 2014 at 9:54am PDT 
Which prompted a response from Harlow. 
In an August 2015 interview with Complex , the model addressed her connection to Drake, explaining, “I’m friends with his producer, 40, so I met everyone through him. I’m just like, the little sister. They call me the ‘6 Goddess.'” Subscribe to DX Newsletter Get The Most Important Stories Of The Day Straight To Your Inbox Thank You! Thank You! Thank You!
